title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Zero-Downtime at Scale: Migrating Peacock's Global Streaming to EKS (IND3325)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 规模化零停机：将Peacock全球流媒体迁移至EKS (IND3325)
abstract: Journey through the strategic migration of a major streaming platform from self-managed Kubernetes to Amazon EKS. Learn how, in less than 12 months, a multi-region transition was orchestrated spanning 200+ applications with zero service disruption for more than 41M subscribers. We'll explore the technical patterns, infrastructure automation, and collaboration strategies that enabled seamless cutover while maintaining developer productivity. Discover practical insights for planning large-scale EKS migrations and building resilient multi-region architectures.
abstract_cn: 探索一个主要流媒体平台从自管理Kubernetes到Amazon EKS的战略迁移之旅。了解如何在不到12个月的时间内，协调跨越200多个应用程序的多区域转换，为超过4100万订阅者实现零服务中断。我们将探讨技术模式、基础设施自动化和协作策略，这些策略实现了无缝切换，同时保持了开发人员的生产力。发现规划大规模EKS迁移和构建弹性多区域架构的实用见解。
